details.brokersummary:
Large 2 bedroom located at Bleecker and Cypress at the Ridgewood / Bushwick border!
Close to the Myrtle Wyckoff L / M trains, Boobie Trap Bar, Milk & Pull Coffee, Klom Klorm Restaurant, Old Stanley's Bar, Talon Bar, Bushwick Diner, etc.
- 2 king sized bedrooms on opposite ends - full sized 3rd bedroom in middle - all rooms have natural light - newly renovated
Available 11/1 SMALL pets OK No broker fee

1 bed 1 bath in gorgeous area of Crown Heights
- Elevator building - Newly renovated - Huge bedroom - Big living area with window - On-site super - Stainless steel appliances
10/1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat and hot Water is included. Could be used as a 1 bedroom --OR--- 1 bedroom + office ---OR--- 2 bedroom with small living area. The choice is yours!
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Sept 1 move in Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive!
Reside in a gorgeous 3 bed / 1 bath apartment with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. Sun drenched and great closet space. You?re just one stop from Manhattan. Close to Domino Park, Social House Cafe, Peter Luger?s. Pies-n-Thighs, etc. Marcy J train nearby.
- Heat and hot water included - SMALL pets are allowed.
Available October 1st (or sooner!) No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK September 1 move in

Awesome corner unit 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Good size living area with lots of sunlight Separate kitchen area Heat and hot water included Live in super
Great location ? near JMZ trains and countless locals restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. The Rosemont, Williamsburg Pizza, Fiction Bar/Cafe, Domino Sugar Factory Park, Williamsburg Bridge, Pies-N-Thighs, Peter Luger, etc
Small pets welcome

Huge pre-war 1 bedroom!
- rent stabilized
1 large bedroom 1 big living room (with windows) Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances Elevator building Heat and hot water included
Small pets OK Available June 1 Broker fee applies

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK 11/1 move in

Super sized 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available 11/1 Small pets accepted

Myspace Exclusive!
This incredible one bed bedroom apartment is just south of the Williamsburg Bridge and short distance to some of the best restaurants and bars Brooklyn has to offer! The apartment has an L-shaped living area with big windows, stainless steel kitchen, exposed brick.
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat & hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
November 1 move in Small pets OK No fee

Awesome new 1 bedroom for December 1st! Rent stabilized!
- 1 big bedroom - Large living area - Newly renovated
Laundry in building Shared roof deck
Perfect location! Birdy's, Hart Bar, Rebecca's Bar, Santa Panaza Italian, Lone Wolf, Marco's etc. JMZ only 1 block away.
Dec 1st move in Pets OK for additional fee

Awesome new 2 bedroom for November 1st! Rent stabilized!
- 2 big bedrooms - Large living area - Newly renovated
Laundry in building Shared roof deck
Perfect location! Birdy's, Hart Bar, Rebecca's Bar, Santa Panaza Italian, Lone Wolf, Marco's etc. JMZ only 1 block away.
November 1st move in Pets OK for additional fee

2 Bed w/ 4? ? 14? private terrace in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Parking is subject to availability ($300/mo extra for designated spot) Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok! NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in!
Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Chic 2 Bedroom / 1bath Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! One large bedroom and one smaller bedroom with a skylight . See video . Second bedroom makes a great office or extra hangout space! Both bedroom fit queen sized beds. Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train. Featuring:
- Private Balcony - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - Roof deck - Garage - Zipcar in Garage, yas!
Such a great location, with tons of cafe's, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson's, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!!

2 Bed w/ 4? ? 14? private terrace in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Parking is subject to availability ($300/mo extra for designated spot) Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok! NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in!
Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Chic 2 Bedroom / 1bath Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! Large living room. Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train.
Featuring: - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - Roof deck - Garage - Zipcar in Garage, yas!
Such a great location, with tons of cafe's, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson's, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!!

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

Everything you?ve been looking for in Bushwick is right here! This 2nr floor, two bedroom in a fun neighborhood has original wood molding details and plenty of windows to allow the natural light to flow in. Massive living room with a window bringing in natural light. Cross the street and sip your morning coffee at Maria Hernandez park. Enjoy the multitude of neighborhood cafes and bars. No need to worry about commute times, the Jefferson L train stop is just two blocks from your door. All this and pet-friendly too!
No fee pets ok Call or text to set up a viewing
2br / 1bath Bedrooms on opposite sides of apartment Renovated kitchen and bath Next to myrtle/wyckoff L and M stop

Virtual tours available!Beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

Virtual Tour Available! Beautiful 1.5 BR/1bath apartment in fabulous Bushwick!This apartment is in the pindrop-quiet "rear" building of this unique courtyard complex! It's like your own little treehouse in the middle of Bushwick. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.No brokers fee!Only First & SecurityContact to schedule your appointment today!

Spacious, beautifully renovated Studio with Balcony in Prime Bushwick ? Elevator building with Garage Parking and Laundry!!
Located near Morgan L and Flushing JM, near Maria Hernandez Park and steps from great bars, restaurants and shopping
Please see video on StreetEasy or send me a message and I?ll send to you. Video is of 3B which is identical as 4B is occupied currently until the end of the month.
Features: - Private Balcony!! - Elevator - Laundry Room - Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan - Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances - Installed PVAC units for AC and Heating - Hardwood floors - Garage with Zip Cars - Designated parking spots ($300/mo)
?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE! Contact us now to set up a viewing!

Spacious, beautifully renovated Studio with Balcony in Prime Bushwick ? Elevator building with Garage Parking and Laundry!!
Located near Morgan L and Flushing JM, near Maria Hernandez Park and steps from great bars, restaurants and shopping
Please see video on StreetEasy or send me a message and I?ll send to you. Video is of 3B which is identical as 4B is occupied currently until the end of the month.

?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE! Contact us now to set up a viewing!

Beautiful 3BR 3Bath in Boerum Hill featuring: Open layout kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances, Hardwood Floors, shared Rooftop and Laundry in Building.
AMENITIES: ? Central A/C? ? Eat In Kitchen? ? Stainless Steel Appliances? ? Laundry in building? ? Hardwood Floors? ? Video Intercom? ? High Ceilings? ? Roof access ? Shared Backyard
Right in the middle of Carroll Gardens/Gowanus and just blocks away from Barclays Center you can enjoy all of the Shops, Restaurant, Bars and Entertainment from these Amazing Neighborhoods!

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

Beautiful 2 BR/1.5 bath duplex apartment in East Williamsburg, prime location!
This 3 bedroom apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Roberta's, Sweet Science, Honey's, Wayward Social, Syndicated, Guadalupe, Reclamation, Ichiran, Momo Sushi Shack, El Cortez.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedroom(s), stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful 3 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!
This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short distance to the J, M trains.
1 month free

Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

Spacious 1.5 bed / 1 bath railroad-style apartment with a separate living room and an additional flexible space that can serve as a dining room, second bedroom, or home office. The primary bedroom and kitchen enjoy abundant sunlight throughout the day!
Expansive KING-sized bedroom, very generous layout Ample closet space Full bathroom with a tub Large, well-equipped kitchen Flooded with natural light all day long Beautiful architectural charm Pet-friendly Prime location at the border of Park Slope and Gowanus Just ONE BLOCK from the F/G/R trains at 4th Ave / 9th St.
LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! A short walk to Whole Foods and the best restaurants, bars, and entertainment in Park Slope and Gowanus. This charming pre-war apartment offers an unbeatable combination of character and convenience!

Beautiful 2-Bedroom with City Views in Stuyvesant Heights!
Located at 930 De Kalb Avenue, this 2-bedroom, 1-bath apartment combines modern comfort with historic charm in the heart of Stuyvesant Heights.
Apartment Highlights:
Spacious bedrooms with ample room Sleek bathroom with stylish finishes Unique design elements across floors Elegant white marble staircase Building Perks:
Rooftop with stunning Manhattan skyline views Surrounded by historic brownstones Quick 25-minute commute to the city Close to J, M, and Z trains for easy transit Simple application process; guarantors accepted.
Don?t miss out on this mix of modern amenities and classic charm in one of Brooklyn?s top neighborhoods! Schedule a visit today!

Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. Not only will you have the chance for somewhat of a city escape, but you will still have everything you need around you with full size grocers, pharmacies, bodegas, liquor stores, retail shops, tattoo shops, whatever your heart desires! You won?t be miss out on any luxuries inside your new home at The Ballgreen Complex either! Fully equipped with all a renter could need in NYC. Come on by and take a look with us!
Conveniently located off the 2, 5, and Q trains, as well as the B12, B35, B44, and B49 bus lines.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability) Virtual Doorman

Reside in a beautifully renovated 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in the historic Crown Heights neighborhood, where old-school charm meets modern convenience. This gorgeous apartment features stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, abundant natural sunlight, and contemporary finishes. Enjoy central A/C and heat, outdoor spaces, and laundry facilities within the building.
Located between Atlantic Avenue and Eastern Parkway, this prime location offers easy access to the A, C, 2, 3, and 4 trains, as well as the B15, B45, B46, and B65 bus routes. Crown Heights is a diverse and convenient community, with a short walk to the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and the Botanic Garden.
Enjoy a seamless commute to Manhattan and easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods.

BUILDING FEATURES: Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability) Virtual Doorman

Find Your Ideal Manhattan Home! This stylishly updated 2-bedroom apartment combines contemporary finishes with a prime location. You?ll be steps away from the best dining, shopping, and entertainment the city has to offer. Don?t let this unique opportunity pass by!
Highlights:
Open and roomy layout Sleek kitchen and bathroom design Beautiful hardwood floors Generous closet space In-unit washer and dryer Arrange a visit today and step into your future home!

Lovely two-bedroom apartment available right off of Nostrand Ave nestled away on a tree-lined block! Private yard!
Reside in a gorgeous 2 bed / 1 bath apartment with spacious layout, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. Heat and hot water included.
To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Short distance to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela?s, Dutch Boy, Cent?Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady?s and more!
Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods.
9/1 move in Cats only (no dogs, sorry)

New development!
Incredible, modern, trenched in sunlight new building at 923 Broadway in Bushwick, Brooklyn!
The units feature - W/D in unit - Dishwasher - Central AC - Balconies (floors 3 and up) - Tons of natural light
Shared roof deck for the building.
Prime location, right on the Bushwick/Bed Stuy border, just moments to JMZ trains. Local favorites include: Birdy's Bar, Santa Panza Italian, Marco's Bar, drip coffee makers cafe, Rebecca's Bar, The Looking Glass, Maria Hernandez Park, and much much more.
No broker fee 11/1 move in Cats welcome

This building is arguably THE MOST desirable neighborhood in Brooklyn. Right on the Williamsburg Waterfront with gorgeous river and city views, all the restaurants, coffee shops, bars, art and music venues, plant shops, parks, farmers markets, grocers, and absolutely anything and everything else you could desire right outside your door. Be warned: the luxury experience you are offered inside the building may leave you feeling torn about whether to go out and enjoy the bustle of the neighborhood or stay in and enjoy your own amenities right here at home!Conveniently located off the J. M, and L trains, as well as the B32, B62, and Q59 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Courtyard Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Package Room Finished Roof Deck First & Security NO FEE

Introducing a brand new luxury building located in the charming Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO! Indulge in breathtaking views spanning both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Immerse yourself in the abundance of nearby parks, including John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park, and many more. Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.

State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
